description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avoid the obstacles that lie on the train cars. Jump the barrels of the right color, break the boxes and you will make more points! More barrels you will jump in sequence and multiply your score much more! Challenge your friends trying to make the highest record!
description.short: Avoid the obstacles that lie on the train cars. Jump the barrels of the right color, break the boxes and you will make more points! More barrels you will jump in sequence and multiply your score much more! Challenge your friends trying to make the highest record!
